f4062411-453a-4239-8848-a84a3e6915d7.label: home_hero_title
f4062411-453a-4239-8848-a84a3e6915d7.content: Unlock your negotiation potential and maximize impact.

376b3f89-8622-480a-a8ab-aa47daba0261.label: home_hero_description
376b3f89-8622-480a-a8ab-aa47daba0261.content: Whether in business deals, policy negotiations, conflicts, or personal relationships, this practical guide equips you with empowering mindsets and tools to succeed.

be09fdd4-7f78-4def-a113-f0e1ff80f7e9.label: home_about_description
be09fdd4-7f78-4def-a113-f0e1ff80f7e9.content:
Negotiation is any effort to persuade. We negotiate all the time, about everything, with everyone, since our birth. It is a learnable skill: systematic negotiation processes, tools, and skills can help us get what we truly value.
The most ambitious changemakers use negotiations to create the world we envision. In Impact Negotiations we take into account the broader effects of our decisions and deals on others and the planet. We decide the scope of our negotiations considering what truly matters to us, our families, our organizations, our communities, and the world.

4cec6540-b197-4524-b966-2eb698dbef73.label: home_why_title
4cec6540-b197-4524-b966-2eb698dbef73.content: How to negotiate like an expert?

c51e8689-6489-4c1f-aa24-c85a97c714d7.content: Structured tools can accelerate learning, systematic application, and negotiation results.

content.title: Negotiate
content.description: for maximum impact: adopt empowering mindsets, prepare with the Negotiation Canvas, and apply, impact, and learn

content.title: Connect
content.description: through solid bridges: ever-improving working relationships plus effective and efficient communication

content.title: Create
content.description: high-impact deals by satisfying all parties' interests, exploring creative options, and persuading with legitimacy.

content.title: Choose
content.description: to either implement solid commitments or walk away to pursue good alternatives.

41b986cb-14d4-4963-afdb-ca89df9a9f4f.content: Nuno Delicado is a negotiation expert with extensive experience in complex negotiations worldwide. Learn from this practical guide and negotiate for maximum impact

931e879d-fe4e-4d6d-b843-73bbf70e64f0.content: This toolkit translates key concepts and techniques into a set of tools to help address typical negotiation challenges. Start with the Negotiation Canvas and learn more about the other 50+ tools
